## BaseProgress class

An Progress HTML Element. Implements the [ARIA progressbar](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#progressbar)<!-- -->.


indeterminate - The slot for a custom indeterminate indicator


progress - Represents the progress element


determinate - The determinate indicator


indeterminate - The indeterminate indicator

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BaseProgress extends FoundationElement 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [max](./fast-foundation.baseprogress.max.md) |  | number | The maximum value |
|  [min](./fast-foundation.baseprogress.min.md) |  | number | The minimum value |
|  [paused](./fast-foundation.baseprogress.paused.md) |  | boolean | Indicates the progress is paused |
|  [value](./fast-foundation.baseprogress.value.md) |  | number \| null | The value of the progress |
